methods.name: createApplication
methods.desc: Create an abstracted account for an EOA

methods.name: verifyAppAuthAddr
methods.desc: Verify the contract account is not rekeyed

methods.name: rekeyToEOA
methods.desc: Rekey this contract account to the EOA

args.name: flash
args.desc: Whether or not this should be a flash rekey. If true, the rekey back to this contract must done in the same txn group as this call

methods.name: rekeyToPlugin
methods.desc: Temporarily rekey to an approved plugin app address

methods.name: transferEOA
methods.desc: Transfer the abstracted account to a new EOA.

methods.name: addPlugin
methods.desc: Add an app to the list of approved plugins

methods.name: removePlugin
methods.desc: Remove an app from the list of approved plugins
